Trade hard or Trade smart?

We like trading because we believe it’s the smartest way to grow our money.

We think it’s so easy we can do it as a side job to make some extra cash. So..

We start taking courses after courses that promise us a profitable, consistent yield.
But only a handful of students find success in following those courses.

Though most of the strategies out there are “good”, they are not so good enough. Why?

The reality is..

Reason #1
many traders find themselves stuck with these painful process of information gathering.

At the end they still require you to “devote” so much time in the process.
Manually collecting numbers of information from different stock, jumping from platform to platform, chart to chart just to confirm a signal.
At the end you wasted most of your energy there, and less is spend on what is really matters.

Reason #2
Because there will always be great opportunities that slipped under your radar

Even though you are very skillful with such manual task.
Can you imagine doing that with more than 100 stocks daily, what about 500?
If not, how can you be sure that your decision is the best among every possible option?

At Impowered we believe that “Great” trading strategy for you

is one that allows you to focus on making the best possible profit

while taking away your burden completely. Trade smart like never before.

We monitor over 700+ stocks daily!

We boil them down to a few that meet your criteria,

and help you strike them at the best timing.

Wanting to learn some other smart strategies?

We have curated a list of strategies that are proven by ourselves to work in most of the market conditions.
